price: Akenda kwa ahali yake na akaja na ndama aliye nona.
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجۡلٖ سَمِينٖ
footnotes: Akenda kwa mkewe naye ana khofu, akaja na ndama aliye nona.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ahlihi fajāa biʿij'lin samīnin
